content.description: Which of the following definite integrals are equal to <math alttext="the limit as n approaches infinity, of, the sum, from k equals 1, to n, of, open parenthesis, negative 2, plus, the fraction 8 k over n, close parenthesis, cubed, times the fraction 8 over n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munder><msup><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> ?
content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, negative 2 to 6, of, x cubed, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math><math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 8, of, open parenthesis, negative 2, plus x, close parenthesis, cubed, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></msubsup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math><math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 1, of, 8 times, open parenthesis, negative 2, plus 8 x, close parenthesis, cubed, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

topic.text: 6.3: Riemann Sums, Summation Notation, and Definite Integral Notation

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
